Articles.Content:
I keep on getting 

ReflectionTypeLoadException: Exception of type 'System.Reflection.ReflectionTypeLoadException' was thrown.

 when loading a game or pressing and holding F9. Only exception to this is if I select to load immediately after opening KSP.

  

[LOG 21:02:22.138] ******* Log Initiated for Kerbal Space Program - 1.8.1.2694 (WindowsPlayer x64) en-us *******
Kerbal Space Program - 1.8.1.2694 (WindowsPlayer x64) en-us

CPU: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-4790 CPU @ 3.60GHz (8)
RAM: 16322
GPU: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980 (4053MB)
SM: 50 (Direct3D 11.0 [level 11.1])
RT Formats: ARGB32, Depth, ARGBHalf, Shadowmap, RGB565, ARGB4444, ARGB1555, Default, ARGB2101010, DefaultHDR, ARGB64, ARGBFloat, RGFloat, RGHalf, RFloat, RHalf, R8, ARGBInt, RGInt, RInt, BGRA32, RGB111110Float, RG32, RGBAUShort, RG16, BGRA10101010_XR, BGR101010_XR, R16

... removed unnecessary log lines ...

I have included the logs where I have pressed F5, tried something, shut down KSP, found the quicksave entry, tried it again, and then tried to load with F9 which fails, crashed, tried F9 again (which fails again)

 

i had the auto science plugin installed, but this is done with the plugins folder completely empty
The fix was to uninstall and reinstall the game, backing up the save folder. the erroneous files where insome other folders than plugins
